options.content:
Individual Flows
  • This dashboard shows per-flow level data, given a particular source and destination organization.
  • The table shows the volume, rate, duration (in hours, minutes and seconds) and retransmits for the top 1000 largest flows.
  • Click on the timestamp of an individual flow to show more detailed information about that flow.
  • All times are displayed in browser local time.

targets.query: meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$dest AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND meta.src_resource_name:$src_resource AND meta.dst_resource_name:$dst_resource AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))

options.content: NetSage Sensors Observing Selected Organization Flows

targets.query: ((meta.src_organization:$src AND meta.dst_organization:$dest) OR (meta.src_organization:$dest AND meta.dst_organization:$src)) AND meta.sensor_id:$sensors AND ((meta.src_resource_name:$src_resource AND meta.dst_resource_name:$dst_resource) OR (meta.src_resource_name:$dst_resource AND meta.dst_resource_name:$src_resource)) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.is_network_testing)) OR meta.is_network_testing:no OR meta.is_network_testing:$is_net_test) AND ((!(_exists_:meta.country_scope)) OR meta.country_scope:$country_scope) AND (( (!(_exists_:meta.src_ip)) OR meta.src_ip:${subnet.regex}*) OR ( (!(_exists_:meta.dst_ip)) OR meta.dst_ip:${subnet.regex}*))
